game.name: The Henry Stickmin Collection

game.shortDescription: A choose-your-own-path where failing is more fun than succeeding.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A choose-your-own-path where failing is more fun than succeeding.

reviewHighlights.text: 후반으로 갈수록 더 퀄리티가 높아지고 재밌어지는 작품
내가 본 스토리중 3번째로 스토리가 좋았던 게임 [spoiler] 찰스 살려네ㅠㅠ [/spoiler]
